title: Column icons don't show up when connecting to Derby database
description: When connecting to a Derby database in the application, the column icons are not being displayed.
OB: When attempting to connect to a Derby database, the column icons do not appear in the application.
EB: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons should be displayed in the application.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the application.
2. Go to the database connection settings.
3. Enter the necessary details to connect to a Derby database.
4. Click on the connection button.
5. Observe that the column icons are not visible in the displayed tables.
